text: IndusInd Bank Limited is an Indian banking and financial services company with its headquarters in Mumbai, Maharashtra. It was founded in April 1994 by then Union Finance Minister Manmohan Singh. ==Board of directors== Sumant Kathpalia is the Managing Director and CEO at IndusInd Bank, while Arun Khurana is the Deputy CEO and Executive Director at IndusInd Bank. Sunil Mehta is the current chairman of the board. The other members on the board are T. T. Ram Mohan, Akila Krishnakumar, Rajiv Agarwal, Bhavna Doshi, Jayant Deshmukh, Pradeep Udhas, Lingam Venkata Prabhakar, Rakesh Bhatia and Sudip Basu. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1994 establishments
title: IndusInd Bank
